sentence.text: Based on screening results, five unique genes (GNPAT, SUMO1, SPINT2, positive regulation of transcription, DNA-templated, and regulation of transcription, DNA-templated) significantly potentiated the growth inhibitory effects of CDDO-Me and induced apoptosis in A375, a BRAF mutated melanoma line (P < 0.001).

Our findings indicate that ether lipid biosynthetic process, SUMO1, SPINT2, positive regulation of transcription, DNA-templated, and SSX1 play critical roles in synergy with inflammation pathways in modulating melanoma cell survival and could serve as sensitizing targets to enhance CDDO-Me efficacy in melanoma growth control
